summary: This module orchestrates the registration of Prefect block types and their schemas within the server. It loads block definitions from bundled collection data, installs protected system blocks, and provides utilities to automatically register blocks during server initialization.
business_intent: Enable the Prefect platform to recognize and manage reusable infrastructure components (blocks) by programmatically loading their definitions, safeguarding core system blocks, and automating their registration so that users can configure and employ these components in workflows.
